channel.title: Entertainment Rush
channel.itunes:author: Samony
channel.itunes:summary: Entertainment Rush delivers fast updates from music, movies, celebrities, and pop culture. You get daily stories on new releases, viral moments, celebrity news, and cultural trends shaping conversation. Content stays short, clear, and engaging. Each episode breaks stories into clear highlights you follow easily. No clutter. No filler. Coverage spans Nollywood, Hollywood, Afrobeats, streaming platforms, red carpet events, and social buzz. Entertainment Rush fits listeners who want to stay current without noise. Follow Entertainment Rush for entertainment news people share, search, and talk about.
channel.itunes:keywords: mercy johnson, celebrity scandal, nigerian entertainment, gossip, social media trends, ckay, love nwantiti, spotify, music, nigeria, afrobeats, streaming

item.title: Nollywood Scandal: Suicidal Thoughts, Broken Promises, and a Pastor!
item.description:
Nollywood actress Doris Ogala alleges suicidal thoughts following a bitter dispute with Pastor Chris Okafor, who she claims reneged on a marriage promise, proposed to another woman, and orchestrated her arrest multiple times. "Entertainment Rush" dissects the shocking details.
Hosts: Host: Abigail (Host), Co-Host: Sister Nkechi (Guest)
Category: Entertainment
------------------------------------------- Follow Samony Podcast: Twitter: https://twitter.com/samony25 Instagram: https://instagram.com/samony25 Facebook: https://facebook.com/samony25 YouTube: https://youtube.com/@samony25 TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@samony25
Website: https://www.samony.com.ng Contact us: socials@samony.com.ng -------------------------------------------

item.title: Tonto Dikeh's 27-Year Smoke Battle - Entertainment Rush!
item.description:

item.title: The Prof. Papa & Bimbo's Bling!
item.description:
"Entertainment Rush" delves into the heartwarming and surprisingly dramatic gist of Nollywood actress Bimbo Ademoye's father bagging a doctorate degree, questioning if it's genuine family pride or a PR spectacle, with insights from Queen of Gist, Sister Nkechi.

item.title: Nicki Minaj's Naija Christian Cry: Gist or Gospel Truth?
item.description:
Sister Nkechi and Emeka dive deep into Nicki Minaj's emotionally charged social media posts pleading for Christians in Nigeria. They unravel the celebrity's motivations, public reactions, and whether her intervention truly matters, all wrapped in high-energy gossip.
Hosts: Host: Sister Nkechi (Guest), Co-Host: Emeka (Interviewer)

item.title: Mansion, Mistress, & Mercy Johnson's Husband: The Gist That's Rocking Nigeria!
item.description:
Chinedu discusses the trending allegations against Mercy Johnson's husband, who is accused of buying a mansion for a pregnant mistress. He highlights the viral nature of the story, the significant reactions from Nigerians, and the shock value of the claims, maintaining a high-energy, fast-paced radio style with rhetorical questions and a mix of English and Pidgin.
Hosts: Host: Chinedu (Tech Bro)
Category: Entertainment

item.title: CKay's 'Love Nwantiti' Shatters Records: 1 Billion Spotify Streams!
item.description:
Musa explodes with excitement over CKay's 'Love Nwantiti' becoming the first solo Nigerian song to hit 1 billion Spotify streams, hailing it as a monumental achievement for Nigerian music and Afrobeats globally, a true testament to national pride and cultural soft power.
Hosts: Host: Musa (Sport)
Category: Entertainment

item.title: 2Baba's N7m Legal Battle: The Political Pulse Explodes!
item.description:

item.title: Obi Cubana Laughs Off Abuja Eviction Controversy!
item.description:
Host Peter Johnson provides a high-energy rundown of Nigerian businessman Obi Cubana's response to the eviction reports concerning his Abuja lounge. Cubana broke his silence by sharing a video of himself laughing amidst the controversy, sparking widespread discussion. The segment explores what this bold move signifies, engaging listeners with rhetorical questions about confidence versus strategy.
Hosts: Host: Peter Johnson
Category: Entertainment

item.title: 2Baba's Marital Whirlwind: Unfollowing, Probes, and Alleged Arrest
item.description:
This episode delves into the latest marital drama surrounding music icon 2Baba, including the social media unfollowing between his wife Annie Macaulay-Idibia and Yvonne Jegede, an alleged probe by the Edo Assembly into 'Natasha' over misconduct, and the shocking confirmation of 2Baba's alleged arrest in the UK by his former manager. Hosts Peter Johnson and Sister Nkechi offer analysis on the public nature of celebrity relationships and the impact on legacy.
Hosts: Host: Peter Johnson, Co-Host: Sister Nkechi
Category: Entertainment
------------------------------------------- Follow Samony Podcast: Twitter: https://twitter.com/samony25 Instagram: https://instagram.com/samony25 Facebook: https://facebook.com/samony25 YouTube: https://youtube.com/@samony25 TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@samony25

item.title: 2Baba's Marital Saga: UK Altercation & Alleged Arrest
item.description:
This episode delves into the recent public altercation involving Nigerian music icon 2Baba Idibia and Natasha Osawaru, including claims of an alleged arrest in the UK. We discuss the circulating videos, the confirmation from his ex-manager, and the extensive public reaction, analyzing the impact on his legacy and the pressures of celebrity life.
Hosts: Host: Kingsley (Naija), Co-Host: Aisha (Radio)

item.title: Burna Boy's Cancelled US Shows: Low Sales & The I Go Save Clapback! E Shock You?
item.description:
This episode dives deep into the shocking cancellation of Burna Boy's US tour dates due to low ticket sales. We dissect the online uproar, comedian I Go Save's fierce criticism of Nigerians celebrating the news, and what this all means for the African Giant's global appeal.
Hosts: Host: Puck, Co-Host: Zephyr
Category: Entertainment
